channel.title: How to use hamachi AKA ham
channel.description:
Ok....donwload hamachi-witch is a network to go on other peoples servers/buisness chat rooms etc etc.Open it,and once it's loaded,click on the triange.Select-join an existing network.Then,where it says "netowork name" fill in the name of the network.Where it says "network pass",fill in the pass.
Example: you go on a server advertisement,and it IS online,you have the server IP checked,port checked,but STILL can't get in and it is online.Well,open/restore hamachi,click on the triange-join network,read the advertisement,find where it says "HAM: network: *ham network name here* and fill that into your network name space.Where it says "HAM network pass: fill in the pass of the network,and but that in the network pass space..Then,check the port and IP,and log in-BAM you'r in.
Hope this helps :).
PS: It's not just for servers,it's for other gaming,buisness chat-rooms,communication,ANYTHING ONLINE-YOU NAME IT :)
PPS: I know theres a guide on how to use hamachi already,but,this isn't leeched or anything,I didn't even read the other guide.
Go to this link to learn how to make a hamachi server *link coming very soon* I HOPE THIS GUIDE HELPED YOU ALL.

item.title: How to use hamachi AKA ham
item.dc:creator: @deidera deidera
item.description:
@deidera wrote:

Ok…donwload hamachi-witch is a network to go on other peoples servers/buisness chat rooms etc etc.Open it,and once it’s loaded,click on the triange.Select-join an existing network.Then,where it says “netowork name” fill in the name of the network.Where it says “network pass”,fill in the pass.

Example: you go on a server advertisement,and it IS online,you have the server IP checked,port checked,but STILL can’t get in and it is online.Well,open/restore hamachi,click on the triange-join network,read the advertisement,find where it says "HAM: network: ham network name here and fill that into your network name space.Where it says "HAM network pass: fill in the pass of the network,and but that in the network pass space…Then,check the port and IP,and log in-BAM you’r in.

Hope this helps :).

PS: It’s not just for servers,it’s for other gaming,buisness chat-rooms,communication,ANYTHING ONLINE-YOU NAME IT

PPS: I know theres a guide on how to use hamachi already,but,this isn’t leeched or anything,I didn’t even read the other guide.

Go to this link to learn how to make a hamachi server link coming very soon
I HOPE THIS GUIDE HELPED YOU ALL.
